email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope you're doing well. We have an inquiry for shipping 12,000MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai under CIF terms. Could you provide a suitable vessel and an initial freight quote?

Best regards,
Liam Harris

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thanks for reaching out. We can offer the vessel OCEAN TRADER for this shipment. The initial freight quote is USD 42.50 per metric tonne. The vessel has a DWT of 75,000 and an LOA of 225m. Laycan is flexible, starting from October 5th.

Let me know your thoughts.
Best,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hello Sophia,

Thank you for the prompt response. The rate of USD 42.50 seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you review this and possibly offer a more competitive rate? Also, could you specify the demurrage rates and the expected loading window in Newcastle?

Looking forward to your revised offer.
Best,
Liam

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Liam,

After reviewing the market conditions, we can offer a revised rate of USD 40.00 per metric tonne. The demurrage rate is USD 8,000 per day, and the loading window in Newcastle is 3 days, weather permitting. The laycan remains flexible, starting from October 5th.

Please let me know if this works for you.
Best,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Final Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Thank you for the revised offer. We accept the rate of USD 40.00 per metric tonne. Please confirm the laycan dates and send over the recap.

Best regards,
Liam

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Recap
email_chain.body:
Liam,

Confirmed. The laycan dates are October 5th to October 10th. I will send over the recap shortly.

Best,
Sophia
